attributes.action: Follow Scotland in making period products free
attributes.additional_details: Scotland have already done this and the decision has been highly praised, period products should be free, isn’t that obvious?
attributes.background: Make all period products free in the UK

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
